Text.Name: Craftsman
Text.Desc: A person who excels at handicraft. This one excels at making things fast and well.

Text.Name: Reader
Text.Desc: A well-educated person, capable of comprehending obscure content.

Text.Name: Warrior
Text.Desc: A natural warrior, this one is able to endure great pains and keep calm under any circumstances.

Text.Name: DeepPotential
Text.Desc: A person born with great talent, this one can cultivate effortlessly.
